document_data.name: Allan Redhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Allan Redhand''' was an adventurer in the ruin of [[Spellgard]].
document_data.Personality: Allan was not bright, and had little patience for social interaction and intrigues. He was happy following Devlin's orders, not caring for the consequences.
document_data.History: Allan joined the [[Free Company of the Crescent]] after Devlin happened to save Allan's sister. In [[1479 DR]], he went with his fellow to Spellgard hoping to find Lady [[Saharel]]'s treasures.
